author: @remindful_of
text:
이건 시작부터 이미 끝임... (진정한 푸른 파스텔톤을 묘사하는 편곡,의상,음색,안무,표정연기)
0:03 가자!!!!! 하며 기합 넣는 호시부터

0:05 박자에 딱딱 맞춰 안무하는 전 멤버 (뭔가 웅장한 큰 거 올 것 같다가)

0:13 에어컨 바람같은 "가끔 잠든 나의 창에 찾아와~"하는 시원한 정한이의 음색 

0:22 노래와 함께 천천히 고조되는 감정을 잘 살린 승관이 "나 꿈결속에서 따뜻한 그의 손 느낄 수 있도러ㄱ허~~어어어우어어" 
여기에 뒤와 양옆에 멤버들 군무가 음의 높이와 크기를 시각적으로 더 잘 보여줘서 너무 좋음 간단하지만 확실한.

0:34 뚜~ 뚜루루뚜뚜 뚜루루뚜뚜~ 하며 세상 밝은 스텝밟으며 군무하는 전 멤버(표정도 너무 밝아보임 ㅠㅜㅜㅠ)]
(여기 낮게 뚜루루뚜뚜 부르는것도 웃김 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ)

0:43 중간중간 호~ 훠우~ 하는 멤버들 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ

0:52 듣자마자 탄식 나오는 우지의 음색" 하지만 오늘밤~"

1:04 짧지만 찰떡파트를 부른 도겸이 " 그를 아는 이 길이~" 안무도 딱임

1:10 보름이 지나면~ 하면서 목소리는 정한이지만 센터에서 또 한 청량하는 에잇이 (에잇이 웃음소리 들리는 것 같아...)

1:12 오잉 하는 깨알 원우

1:17 워이씨.. 빙판에서 스케이트 타는 것 같은 발놀림.. 

1:20 마무리는 젠틀하게 슈아가 "못다전한 내사랑~" 하며 또 눈웃음 날리는 하.. 참나.. 

이거 내 노동요 해야겠따 이 밤에 들어도 이리 신나는 데 일할 때 들으면 능률이 오를 것 같아 정신도 맑아지고

author: @czarahjadebazan8296
text:
Seventeen my babies I love you very much ...my wish that all of you will be always happy ..if you are sad or going through a hard times ..be true to your self don't push yourself to be happy or being to much perfect in front of us carats we carats accepted all you guys for who you are , your craziness, dorkiness, sweetness, emo, short coming and your imperfection and etc. just be true to us because we love you and when you guys has a problem or sad don't afraid to show it we carats are willing to listen to you guys and when your inlove even though many of us will be jealous and heartbroken just let it be.. because we are willing to set you free and to let you be in the girl that you inlove with ...our priority is your happiness and your well being we carat will try harder to not treat you as an idol machine but instead to treat you as human, as a friend, as a brother and last as the man the love of our life that no matter what.... we carat will support in the journey of yourlife ...
- when I wrote this I'm crying because It worries me because you know the current news about ( jonghyung's death) and i can't stop thinking about my babies that one of them might be going through hard times and they can't spill it out because they afraid that many will judge them.....
- Seventeen always remember carats are always here for you....we will accepted you for who you are ....I love you

author: @kimhana1787
text:
I was having bad day yesterday and seeing this video popped up in my notification made my day.. Thank you 13 precious Sebongies.. You guys don't know how much you have changed one of my friend's life.. She really love you guys and after I'm done watching this video, she gave me a call and said " They're making me happy again.." :'). She really wants to meet you guys eyes to eyes.. 

I wish you guys grow well and well known international, deserve all the awards and lastly keep sticking together as 13 diamonds and walk together on the flower path.. Carats know you guys well and none of us gonna leave you behind.. We will always there for you.. As you love us and have faith in us, then it's vice versa for us.. 

And us as CARATS promised : 

1. Always there to cheer you guys up 
2. Always there waiting whenever you need us 
3. Always holding you guys from the bottom and never let go 
4. Always be stars in your life and shining brightly in your night 
5. Always there to hold your hand tightly and never let go even for a second 
6. Always there to catch you guys if you guys are falling apart and stumble on the way to success 
7. Always there to believe that you guys has done the very best in your job and happy with performance 
8. Always there to support each other if one of you guys was hurt in and out until you feel better 
9. Always be the one who will complete the weakness in our memories frame and vice versa 
10. Always proud to mention your name to the other person for your talents, attitude and manner stage. 
11. Always proud to stanning SELF PRODUCE IDOLS that always works their ass off for better result and success 
12. Always keep ourselves calm and did not involve in any fan wars as we know you guys have a good relationship with sunbaenim and hoobaenim.
13. And lastly, ALWAYS PROUD TO BE CARAT AND PART OF THIS BEAUTIFUL FANDOM~~ 

~~ 13 promised represent you guys as 13 diamonds and the beautiful sparkle from the diamonds will always be us that reflect you in the eye of the world.. ~~

author: @eunjayeon7528
text:
This is not a seventeen video until;

-hoshi starts it off with “let’s go!!” or any other type of noise before they start the dance

-you hear boo singing his vocals live (usually always his high notes)

-you hear seventeen join in at the chorus 

-you hear seventeen making inhumane noises to hype up whoever is singing 

-you hear seventeen fancy footwork and claps

-you hear one of them ending the whole video with a comment 

-last but not least TRYING TO KILL CARATS!!


Stan Seventeen

Stan Seungcheol, Jeonghan, Jisoo, Junhui, Soonyoung, Wonwoo, Jihoon, Myeongho, Mingyu, Seokmin, Seungkwan, Hansol, Chan 

Stan Performance Team
Stan Hip-Hip Unit
Stan Vocal Unit
